Results below are based on ~first 150 contests, except for reddit, where contests were small enough to do the first 500 or so.
For Codeforces and Topcoder, additional grid searches were done for TS for lower beta and higher sigma_growth values.
For synthetic, grid search was done on a reduced dataset of 250 participants instead of 2500.

===========
